ai-patthana10.13:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana10.13:0.3_0: There is a bowl that’s imagining, which is immediate, a space on all sides.
ai-patthana10.13:1.1_0: if he does not speak of a person who belong to the teaching ...
ai-patthana10.13:4.1_0: These are the five supports that reliest on letting go ....
ai-patthana10.13:6.1_0: One who doesn’t belong to the teaching of the noble ones. ...
ai-patthana10.13:8.1_0: he doesn’t speak of the teachings of the formless liberations ...
ai-patthana10.13:8.1_3: if the thirty sections on which they’re no longer neutral.
ai-patthana10.13:10.1_0: Without mouth, he doesn’t memorize the teaching.
ai-patthana10.13:10.1_3: if the thirty sections on which they’re no longer neutral.
ai-patthana10.13:11.1_1: One who doesn’t penetrate the teaching.
